Here's your random inspirational quote collection:

## Quotes — inspiration (2026-02-23)

Here are quotes to spark inspiration, from timeless wisdom to cinematic moments:

> "The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
> — Steve Jobs
> *Why it matters: It connects passion to purpose, the foundation of true motivation.*

> "It is not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit."
> — J.R.R. Tolkien
> *Why it matters: It reminds us that inner resilience is our most powerful tool.*

> "Why do we fall? So we can learn to pick ourselves up."
> — Alfred Pennyworth, *Batman Begins*
> *Why it matters: It frames failure as an essential and instructive part of growth.*

> "You must be the change you wish to see in the world."
> — Mahatma Gandhi
> *Why it matters: It places the power and responsibility for progress directly in our own hands.*

> "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
> — Eleanor Roosevelt
> *Why it matters: It champions the courage of vision and optimism.*

> "Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass; it's about learning to dance in the rain."
> — Vivian Greene
> *Why it matters: It advocates for finding joy and agency even in difficult circumstances.*

> "Just keep swimming."
> — Dory, *Finding Nemo*
> *Why it matters: A simple, memorable mantra for perseverance when the path seems unclear.*
